entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, mentioned as thinking Harry would go to Ravenclaw Tower.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist, mentioned as possibly knowing the location of Voldemort's Horcrux.

entities.name: ravenclaw tower
entities.description: A location in Hogwarts where Voldemort thinks Harry might go.

entities.name: alecto carrow
entities.description: A character stationed by Voldemort in the Ravenclaw common room.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts, mentioned as having a lost diadem.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Another house at Hogwarts, mentioned as Voldemort's affiliation.

relationships.description: Voldemort fears that Harry already knows the location of his Horcrux.
Voldemort thinks Harry might go to Ravenclaw Tower.
Alecto Carrow is stationed in the Ravenclaw common room by Voldemort.
Voldemort employs Alecto Carrow to station her in the Ravenclaw common room.
